select a.seq_preference as seq_preference, a.areacode_ref as areacode, a.purpose_code as purpose_code, a.stay_code as stay_code, b.p_cat1 as p_cat1, b.p_cat2 as p_cat2, b.p_cat3 as p_cat3 from preference a, preference_filter b where a.m_id = #{id} and a.age = b.age and a.grouptrip = b.personnel
select * from tour_inquiry where areacode = #{AREACODE} and cat2 in (#{P_CAT1},#{P_CAT2},#{P_CAT3}) and rownum < 21 order by readcount desc
select * from tour_inquiry where areacode = #{AREACODE} and cat2 in (#{PURPOSE_CODE}) and rownum < 21 order by readcount desc
